article.title: Peer reviews of documentation
article.label: Peer Reviews
article.intro: Learn more about peer reviews done in our projects iteratively

text.p: Peer Review is a collaborative event in the project team when an engineer or specialist from another team, author of the document, and project manager review certain project artifacts and identify Defects.
We perform Peer Reviews at least once per Iteration.
The benefits and advantages of Peer Reviews when compared to other methods of Defects revealing are:
SRS, Vision, Schedule, architecture, design, and software code are subject to Peer Reviews.

concepts.c1: Quality is significantly improved when Peer Reviews are used in a project
concepts.c2: SRS is subject to Peer Reviews in all projects, without exception
concepts.c3: Peer reviews increase cost of quality while adding other values to project
